carryBackLossesDecrease.description: Object containing adjustments that decrease the current tax year's total liability based on carry-back of current year losses.

incomeTax.description: The amount of the adjustment for an Income Tax liability decrease resulting from carry-back claims, calculated by reference to an earlier tax year's liability but applied as credit against the current tax year's total tax liability. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

class4.description: The amount of the adjustment for a Class 4 National Insurance contributions liability decrease resulting from carry-back claims, calculated by reference to an earlier tax year's liability but applied as credit against the current tax year's total tax liability. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

capitalGainsTax.description: The amount of the adjustment for a Capital Gains Tax liability decrease resulting from carry-back claims, calculated by reference to an earlier tax year's liability but applied as credit against the current tax year's total tax liability. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

averagingAdjustmentsDecrease.description: Object containing adjustments that decrease the current tax year's total liability from averaging relief claims for eligible taxpayers.

incomeTax.description: The amount of the decrease to Income Tax liability resulting from an averaging relief adjustment, calculated by reference to an earlier tax year's liability and applied as a reduction to the current tax year's total tax liability. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

class4.description: The amount of the decrease to Class 4 National Insurance contributions liability resulting from an averaging relief adjustment, calculated by reference to an earlier tax year's liability and applied as a reduction to the current tax year's total tax liability. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

capitalGainsTax.description: The amount of the decrease to Capital Gains Tax liability resulting from an averaging relief adjustment, calculated by reference to an earlier tax year's liability and applied as a reduction to the current tax year's total tax liability. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
